trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jim Thorpe
There were no other sightings in Jim Thorpe on or around July 16th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWe have been outside looking for plane traffic all day because last night we saw strange lights and we were sckeptical because we never see planes fly where these lights were flying, blinking, dissapearing, reapearing. so through the day today i noticed 0 planes fly that route, or any like it. but i did see 3 go over my house. it was a clear day from what i saw. pilot should have seen it, bet he did. i noticed that first object in that same place as every night prior, these past few weeks..almost months now. i felt i should report this because now because it was soo clear. my mother and friend saw the objects as well. and they have also been around for multiple others from our location on this hillside. Ive been a believer since the start...but over these past weeks i know. we are not alone
Summary: two white discs flew over valley just as airliner was flying by...so obvious it was an UFO
